name: Deathrun Pain
description:
Description: This frustrating game will make you want to unalive yourself. You have 3 lives and only 3 lives. Run through the increasingly hard levels and raise your score by collecting coins throughout the maps. But be careful! Once you run out of all your lives, you’ll be sent back to the first level no matter how far you’ve gotten. Think you’re up for the challenge? 

Instructions: 

  • Use ASD or the arrow keys to move. 
  • Use space to jump 
  • On levels other than the first one, use side sticking to your advantage
  • Avoid falling off the map at all costs
